腾讯的Hunyuan3D-2.1已经放出来了，精度高，比2.0的渲染效果提升了很多

在生成纹理3D资产质量和条件遵循能力上，超过了开源、闭源模型

2.1的PBR流程通过基于物理的材质模拟，生成具有真实光照交互的纹理（比如金属反射），比之前基于RGB的纹理模型更逼真

2.1的权重、代码完全开源

#Hunyuan3D https://t.co/qqgOQDQ1Aw

fullText:
In AI, consumer beats B2B in monetization.

The median consumer AI startup hits $4.2M ARR in year one, with the top quartile at $8.7M. That’s twice the same numbers for B2B AI companies.

So, in fact, it’s consumer AI startups that are scaling revenue the fastest.
